statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinStructures WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT structure_name, resolution, ligand_name FROM ProteinStructures WHERE ligand_id = 5;
SELECT structure_name, interaction_type FROM ProteinStructures WHERE resolution < 1.0 ORDER BY structure_name DESC;
SELECT structure_id, ligand_id, ligand_name, interaction_type FROM ProteinStructures ORDER BY ligand_id ASC, structure_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(resolution) AS avg_resolution FROM ProteinStructures;
SELECT * FROM ProteinStructures WHERE resolution > 2.0 ORDER BY structure_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT structure_id, structure_name, resolution FROM ProteinStructures WHERE ligand_id = 10 AND interaction_type = 'hydrogen bond'
SELECT * FROM ProteinStructures WHERE ligand_name LIKE 'ADP%' AND resolution BETWEEN 2.5 AND 3.0 ORDER BY resolution ASC
SELECT structure_name, interaction_type FROM ProteinStructures WHERE resolution < 2.5 OR ligand_id IS NULL
SELECT AVG(resolution) AS Average_Resolution FROM ProteinStructures WHERE ligand_name IN ('ATP', 'GTP', 'UDP')
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ligands WHERE ligand_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM proteins WHERE protein_id > 10 ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_proteins FROM proteins;
SELECT ligand_name, ligand_structure FROM ligands WHERE ligand_id IN (1, 5, 10) ORDER BY ligand_id DESC;
SELECT p.protein_name, l.ligand_name FROM proteins p INNER JOIN ligands l ON p.protein_id = l.ligand_id;
SELECT * FROM protein_structures ORDER BY protein_id ASC;
SELECT protein_name, structure_file FROM protein_structures WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT ligand_name FROM ligands ORDER BY ligand_id DESC;

SELECT protein_name, ligand_name, interaction_type FROM protein_structures JOIN interactions ON protein_structures.protein_id = interactions.protein_id JOIN ligands ON interactions.ligand_id = ligands.ligand_id;

SELECT protein_name, ligand_name, interaction_type FROM protein_structures JOIN interactions ON protein_structures.protein_id = interactions.protein_id JOIN ligands ON interactions.ligand_id = ligands.ligand_id WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT * FROM protein_structures;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM protein_structures WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM protein_structures WHERE protein_name LIKE '%alpha%';

SELECT protein_name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS num_interactions FROM protein_structures JOIN interactions ON protein_structures.protein_id = interactions.protein_id GROUP BY protein_name ORDER BY num_interactions DESC;

SELECT protein_name, ligand_name, interaction_type FROM protein_structures JOIN interactions ON protein_structures.protein_id = interactions.protein_id JOIN ligands ON interactions.ligand_id = ligands.ligand_id ORDER BY protein_name, ligand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Protein_Structures;
SELECT protein_name, resolution FROM Protein_Structures WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM Ligand_Interactions WHERE affinity <= 5.0 ORDER BY affinity DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, value, measurement_type FROM Experimental_Data WHERE measurement_type = 'RNA-binding';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, resolution FROM Protein_Structures WHERE resolution > 2.0 ORDER BY resolution DESC
SELECT * FROM Ligand_Interactions WHERE affinity < 0.5 ORDER BY interaction_id
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM Researcher
SELECT * FROM Experimental_Data WHERE measurement_type LIKE '%binding%'
SELECT structure_id, COUNT(experiment_id) AS num_experiments FROM Experimental_Data GROUP BY structure_id HAVING num_experiments > 5
SELECT * FROM protein_structures;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM protein_structures ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT ligand_name, interaction_data->>'interaction_type' AS interaction_type FROM ligand_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 3;

SELECT binding_id, protein_name, ligand_name, binding_score FROM protein_ligand_binding INNER JOIN protein_structures ON protein_ligand_binding.protein_id = protein_structures.protein_id INNER JOIN ligand_interactions ON protein_ligand_binding.ligand_id = ligand_interactions.interaction_id;
SELECT molecular_weight, chemical_formula, solubility FROM ligand_properties WHERE ligand_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM protein_structures ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, structure_data FROM protein_structures WHERE protein_id=3;
SELECT ligand_name, interaction_data FROM ligand_interactions WHERE interaction_id=1;
SELECT protein_name, ligand_name FROM protein_structures JOIN protein_ligand_binding ON protein_structures.protein_id = protein_ligand_binding.protein_id;

SELECT protein_name, chemical_formula, solubility FROM protein_structures JOIN protein_ligand_binding ON protein_structures.protein_id = protein_ligand_binding.protein_id JOIN ligand_properties ON protein_ligand_binding.ligand_id = ligand_properties.ligand_id;
